title: 经常性崩溃，求原因
author: 冰雪69
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Oh - I know what I did wrong!

replies.author: undefined
replies.txt_content: 电脑太渣了（太多mod会卡），或者是mod冲突

replies.author: y342900
replies.txt_content: 可能是冲突，你发个mod列表，或者你把最近加入的mod剔除再试试

replies.txt_content: 那就Optifine和神秘都删了试试吧w
